CustomField.description: Indicator if technical fields referenced by Marketing Cloud are in synced with SF formula fields Weeks of Pregnancy for Adult Contact and Age in Months for Child Contact
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Type__c, 'Adult') , WeeksOfPregnancy__c == WeeksOfPregnancy2__c , AgeinMonths__c == AgeinMonths2__c)
CustomField.label: isSynced
